description: Variation of condition 1 (Plan Numbers) pursuant to planning permission 17/4757/FUL dated 20/10/2017 for `Conversion of dwelling house into 2no semi-detached dwelling houses following demolition of the existing single storey rear extension and erection of a part single storey, part two storey side and rear extension with pitch roof to match existing. Extension to roof including 1no rear dormer window and 1no side dormer window to both exising and proposed roof slopes. Associated amenity space, parking, cycle storage, and refuse storage.` Amendments include changes to front door, front windows design, new side door, change to window sitings, change to size of first floor front and rear windows and alteration to window sizies, removal of chimney structure, removal of side door, additional rear rooflight and additional of new rear glazed doors at ground floor level
